result.purpose: This file implements a command-line tool for decoding HCL (HashiCorp Configuration Language) files based on a specified schema.
side_effects: Reads from standard input if no arguments are provided.
Writes output to standard output or a specified file.
Exits the program with an error code on failure.
risks: Potential for command injection if user input is not properly sanitized.
File handling errors may lead to data loss if output file is not handled correctly.
